Package com.krab.lazy

Class PickerColor

java.lang.Object
com.krab.lazy.PickerColor
public class PickerColor extends Object
Data transfer object for ColorPicker value. Hue, saturation, brightness and alpha are normalized to a range of [0,1]. The hex value can be used in any processing colorMode, it will always show the correct color. This object's fields are final, if you want to change the ColorPicker from code, use LazyGui.colorPickerSet instead. Please note that ColorPicker tries to avoid hex values of exactly 0 because they are not transparent in processing even though the alpha is 0, which is probably a bug. It returns 0x00010101 instead which looks perfectly transparent in processing.
See Also:
